about.head: About SHIKRITI
about.details: SHIKRITI offers a line of organic, non-synthetic, and eco-friendly products designed to purify the air and uplift the spirit during prayers and yoga sessions. Each item features an exclusive, long-lasting natural aroma chosen specifically to promote calm and soothe the mind, making them an integral part of any aroma therapy practice. Beyond their high quality, SHIKRITI operates with a strong social mission focusing on female empowerment and aims to reach every household by providing exceptional products at a low price point. The company also builds strong, sustainable relationships with its partners, offering high margins, robust after-sales support, and customization options.
